pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Flake8-forbid-visual-indent[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/ateraz/flake8-forbid-visual-indent.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/ateraz/flake8-forbid-visual-indent)Flake8 plugin that disallows visual indentation. It raises error for indentation style like```pythondef my_function(first_arg: int, second_arg: int) -> int: ...```in favor of```pythondef my_function( first_arg: int, second_arg: int) -> int: ...```
